mapper.select: SELECT p.*, r.*, CASE WHEN p.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'refunded' THEN h.ACTION_DATE ELSE NULL END AS ACTION_DATE FROM PAYMENT p LEFT JOIN regular_user r ON p.BUYER_IDX = r.idx LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY h ON p.PAYMENT_IDX = h.PAYMENT_IDX WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PAYMENT p2 LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY h2 ON p2.PAYMENT_IDX = h2.PAYMENT_IDX WHERE p2.BUYER_IDX = p.BUYER_IDX AND COALESCE(h2.ACTION_DATE, p2.PAYMENT_DATE) > COALESCE(h.ACTION_DATE, p.PAYMENT_DATE) ) OR h.ACTION_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY p.PAYMENT_DATE DESC;
select * from PAYMENT where BUYER_IDX = #{idx} and MATCH_IDX = #{match_idx} order by PAYMENT_DATE desc LIMIT 1
select * from PAYMENT where MATCH_IDX = #{match_idx} and PAYMENT_STATUS = 'paid';

SELECT MONTH(m.match_date) AS month, COUNT(p.payment_idx) AS player_count FROM MATCH_POST m JOIN PAYMENT p ON m.match_idx = p.match_idx WHERE p.payment_status = 'paid' AND YEAR(m.match_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY MONTH(m.match_date) ORDER BY month;
mapper.update: update PAYMENT set PAYMENT_STATUS = 'refunded' where payment_idx = #{payment_idx}
